        0x211d595b7778e340

    GUID = Begin
        0x779d9ffd5e57c241a06640bc0d090862
    End
    RecordSource ="SELECT ExhibitData.EXN, ExhibitData.FYR, ExhibitData.JCAT, ExhibitData.ENTRY_DAT"
        "E, ExhibitData.NCAT, ExhibitData.EXHB_TITLE, ExhibitData.PROTOID, ExhibitData.FL"
        "OOR, ExhibitData.J_1, ExhibitData.J_2, ExhibitData.J_3, ExhibitData.J_4, Exhibit"
        "Data.NUMJUDGES FROM ExhibitData WHERE (((ExhibitData.EXN)>100)) ORDER BY Exhibit"
        "Data.EXN; "

CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False
'    SciFairMaster.mdb  (All class objects and modules)
'
'    Copyright (C) 2001,2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007,2008,2009,2010,2011,2012,2013,
'                  2014  Dennis e.Spanogle
'
'    This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
'    it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
'    the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
'    (at your option) any later version.
'
'    This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
'    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
'    MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
'    GNU General Public License for more details.
'
'    You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
'    along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
'IMPORTANT NOTE: Exhibit Numbers are reserved and used as follows
'NUMBERED EXHIBITS, READY FOR FAIR 000101 to FairInfo.FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT -1
'  Typically 101 to 099,999
'  First exhibit 101 is a NWNMSEF tradition. It reserves 100 exhibit numbers
' for special needs (the old way of handling Special winners ) etc.
'EXHIBITS ADDED with Exhibits Edit,Add,Delete FairInfo.FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT to
' FairInfo.FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT + 99999 (typical 100000 to 199999)
' TEMPORARY NUMBERS USED DURING RENUMBERING: FairInfo.FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT +100000
' and larger  (Typical 200000 and larger)
' TO CHANGE THIS CHANGE table FairInfo FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT
'
' Also, it is important to open this form with ALL RECORDS LOCKED - this will prevent
' problems if other users are adding exhibits (i.e. on other PCs thru the network)
' (Set this option in the forms properties - Data tab - record locks = ALL
'
Option Compare Database
Option Explicit
Private FirstHoldEXN As Long  ' set to 200000 in Form_Load
Private NextHoldEXN As Long
Private FirstAddExn As Long
Private NextAddExn As Long
Private FairInfoRS As Recordset
Private Title As String
Private criteria As String
Private SortedRS As Recordset
Private dbSciFair As Database
Private NewExFound As Long
Private NewExReNumbered As Integer
Private CategoryRS As Recordset
Private Sub btnRenumber_Click()
  Dim rs As Object
  Dim NextInOrder As Long
  Dim debugEXN As Long
  Dim NoNCATEXN As Boolean
  On Error GoTo ErrorSub
  NewExFound = 0  ' prepare a counter to count those > 100000
  NewExReNumbered = 0 ' prepare a counter to count good renumbered exhibits
  CategoryRS.MoveFirst
   Dim temprs1 As Recordset    ' rev 5.2.4  added to delete judge assignments
 Set temprs1 = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset("ExhibitJudges", dbOpenDynaset)
 If Not temprs1.EOF Then
   If MsgBox("JUDGES HAVE BEEN ASSIGNED! " & vbCrLf & _
          "IF YOU RENUMBER YOU WILL HAVE RE-ASSIGN JUDGES AND..." & vbCrLf & _
          "IF SCORE FORMS ARE PRINTED - YOU WILL HAVE TO RE-PRINT THEM!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
          " Do You Want to Delete Judge Assignments AND Re-number?", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, _
          "About to Delete Judge Assignments") = vbNo Then
       temprs1.Close
       MsgBox "Canceled"
       Exit Sub
   End If
 '  Dim Edrs As Recordset  do thi
 '  Set Edrs = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset("Exhibitdata", dbOpenDynaset)
 '  If Not Edrs.EOF Then     ' added rev 5.2.4
 '    Do While Not Edrs.EOF
 '      Edrs!J_1 = ""
 '      Edrs.update
 '    Loop
 '  End If
 '  'edrs.MoveFirst
 '  Edrs.Close
   Do While Not temprs1.EOF
      temprs1.Delete
      temprs1.MoveNext
   Loop
 End If
 temprs1.Close
  NextHoldEXN = FirstHoldEXN  ' 200,001
  ' Before I start, I will renumber all Exhibits greater than 100 to
  ' numbers starting at FirstHoldExn  (200,000)
  ' IMPORTANT THAT THE Form's and SortedRS criteria do NOT INCLUDE
  '  EXN 0 to 100 (for NWNMSEF). This is accomplised in the Forms recordsource
  '  criteria
  Me.tbTask.SetFocus
  Me.tbTask.Text = "Set Temporary EXN Numbers"
  ' NOTE FOR THIS TO WORK YOU MUST HAVE CASCADE UPDATE SET to both
  ' ExhibitStudents and.. to ExhibitJudges  (EXN UPdates when changed in Exhibitsdata
  ' FIRST to avoid a messs - I will check if any Exhibits in the 200000 range
  ' If so, try to move them below 200000 (
  Dim movenum As Long
  movenum = FirstHoldEXN - 2  ' 200001 - 2 = 199999 This allows next sections to work
On Error GoTo move2mbackerror ' trap any problem here with special message
  With Me.Recordset   ' Me.recordset is Exhibits data table only.
    .MoveFirst
    Do While Not .EOF
       If !EXN > FirstHoldEXN - 2 Then '   if > 199999 move it down to 199999 or smaller
         .Edit
         !EXN = movenum
         movenum = movenum - 1 ' store with decreasing numbers. This will
           'avoid conflicts with newly added exhibits starting at first add (100000)
           ' if, these conflicts occur (unlikly) then a manual renumber is required
         .Update   ' NOTE this will update the value of the corresponding EXN in the ExhibitStudents table
       End If
      .MoveNext
    Loop
  ' Now I will renumber ALL remaining Exhibits > 100  up to 200000 range ( now free )
On Error GoTo ErrorSub
   .MoveFirst
   Do While Not .EOF
      .Edit
      ' Notice that if an Exhibit number already exists in the range 200000 +
      ' there will be an error generated (duplicate key)
      If !EXN > FirstAddExn - 1 Then  'if > 100000
        NewExFound = NewExFound + 1  ' count the 'new' not-renumbered Exhibits
      End If
      !EXN = NextHoldEXN   ' Starting at 200,001 and going up.
      !J_1 = Null     '   rev 5.2.4   Have permission to delete judge assignments
      !J_2 = Null
      !J_3 = Null
      !J_4 = Null
      !NUMJUDGES = 0
      .Update
      NextHoldEXN = NextHoldEXN + 1
      .MoveNext
   Loop
  End With
  'NOTE: For this to work, ALL FLOOR Must be set to N or Y or ALL must be set to
  'Blank or Yes.    the program to checks  this out first.
  'NOW, Get the new exhibit data (as renumbered above) but sort it the way we
  ' want it numbered
  criteria = "SELECT ExhibitStudents.F_ORD, ExhibitData.NCAT, " & _
  "ExhibitData.EXN, ExhibitData.FLOOR, ExhibitData.JCAT, Persons.LNAME, " & _
  "Persons.FNAME, Persons.MI FROM (Persons RIGHT JOIN Students ON " & _
  "(Persons.PID = Students.PID) AND (Persons.PID = Students.PID) AND " & _
  "(Persons.PID = Students.PID)) RIGHT JOIN (ExhibitData RIGHT JOIN " & _
  "ExhibitStudents ON ExhibitData.EXN = ExhibitStudents.EXN) ON " & _
  "Students.STID = ExhibitStudents.STID " & _
  "WHERE (((ExhibitStudents.F_ORD = 1 AND ExhibitStudents.EXN > 100))) " & _
  "ORDER BY ExhibitData.NCAT, ExhibitData.JCAT,ExhibitData.FLOOR,  " & _
  "Persons.LNAME, Persons.FNAME, Persons.MI;"
  Set SortedRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  ' SortedRs is driven by Exhibit Students table so if an exhibit is NOT in ExhibitStudents
  '   Then it will not be in this record set.
  CategoryRS.MoveFirst
  Me.tbTask.SetFocus
  Me.tbTask.Text = "Renumbering To Category Ranges"
  Do While Not CategoryRS.EOF
    CategoryRS.Edit
    CategoryRS!NEXT_EX = CategoryRS!FIRST_EX
    CategoryRS.Update
    With SortedRS
      .MoveFirst
      '   find each NCAT in SortedRS. THE FIND ORDER IS THE NEEDED NUMBER ORDER
      '   because SortedRS is sorted correctly
      .FindFirst "NCAT = """ & CategoryRS!NCAT & """"
      Do While Not .EOF And Not .NoMatch
        With Me.Recordset    'Exhibits table  w/o ExhibitStudents right join
          .MoveFirst
          'Assign NEXT_EX to this one
          ' FIND THE MATCHING EXHIBIT IN The Forms Recordset
          .FindFirst "EXN = " & SortedRS!EXN    'See if Sorted Joined Record set EXN is in the ExhibitData Table
          ' See if it exists!  Should - is same record set sorted different
          If .NoMatch Then
          '  Rev 5.3.5 changed wording
            MsgBox "EXN " & SortedRS!EXN & "in current ExhibitStudents table" & vbCrLf & _
                   "is not in the ExhibitData table!" & vbCrLf & _
                   "You must fix this very unusual problem! " & vbCrLf & _
                   "Are Cascade Updates and Inforce Referencial Integrity for EXN still set?", , Title
            SortedRS.Close
            Exit Sub
          End If
          ' See if it has been renumbered already should never, current EXN should
          ' be above 100000
          If !EXN = CategoryRS!NEXT_EX Then 'This should never happen
            debugEXN = !EXN
            ' No work to do on this Exhibit, Already has the correct number
          Else ' READY to change the Exhibit number of the current ExhibitData Table record
          ' to the next new EXN (NEXT_EX) and increment NEXT_EX.
          ' But First see if the new 'EXN to be used' exisits - if so error
          '  Rev 5.3.5   NOTE that if an exhibit is in ExhibitData table but not in ExhibitStudents,
          '     Then it will not be found in this section and thus NOT renumbered.
            Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
            rs.FindFirst "[EXN] = " & CategoryRS!NEXT_EX
            If Not rs.NoMatch Then  '  YEP EXISTS, HAVE A Problem
              debugEXN = rs!EXN
              MsgBox "NEXT_EX EXN " & rs!EXN & " already Assigned, Code error", , Title
              SortedRS.Close
              Exit Sub
            End If
            ' NEXT_EX is free, Found one to renumber
            ' All should be ok to change the EXN here
            debugEXN = CategoryRS!NEXT_EX
            .Edit
            ' ----------------------- RENUMBER TO  CAT RANGE ------
            !EXN = CategoryRS!NEXT_EX
            .Update
             NewExReNumbered = NewExReNumbered + 1
          End If
        End With
        ' Increment and check the limit of the next Exhibit number
        CategoryRS.Edit
        CategoryRS!NEXT_EX = CategoryRS!NEXT_EX + 1
        CategoryRS.Update
        If CategoryRS!NEXT_EX > CategoryRS!LAST_EX Then
          MsgBox "Too Many " & CategoryRS!NCAT & " Exhibits " & vbCrLf & _
          "for Current Category Numbering Scheem. " & vbCrLf & _
          " (NEXT_EX will exceed LAST_EX)" & vbCrLf & _
          "Restructure Categories and the renumber Exhibits again!", , Title
          Exit Do  'give up on this category  but try the next one
        End If
        ' OK on this exhibit, see if anymore with same category
        .FindNext "NCAT = """ & CategoryRS!NCAT & """"
      Loop
    End With
    ' All Done with this Category
    CategoryRS.MoveNext
  Loop '  Loop on CategoryRS
  Me.tbTask.SetFocus
  Me.tbTask.Text = "Renumbering Non-Assigned To Add Range"
  NoNCATEXN = False ' assume there are no Exhibits without NCAT SET
  NextAddExn = FirstAddExn  ' set = to 100000
  ' Need to renumber the exhibits left up at 200000 back down to 100000 again
  '  Those with no NCAT, those with Bad ncats, AND   (Rev 5.3.5) those with no entry in ExhibitStudents table.
  '  and or  No match to NCAT!!!
  ' Move these down to the 100000 range - then reset FairInfo.NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT
  ' so any new exhibits go to the correct place. (See Exhibit Edit Add Delete form)
  Dim tempcount As Integer
  tempcount = 0
  With Me.Recordset   ' using the ExhibitData table recordset
    .MoveFirst
    .FindFirst "EXN BETWEEN " & FirstHoldEXN - 1 & " AND " & NextHoldEXN + 1
    Do While Not .NoMatch And Not .EOF  ' Do this as long as find Exhibits > 199999
      NoNCATEXN = True
      .Edit
      !EXN = NextAddExn  ' 100001 and up
      .Update
      tempcount = tempcount + 1
      NextAddExn = NextAddExn + 1
      '  rev 5.3.5   see if missing a student entry in ExhibitStudents table
      SortedRS.Requery
      SortedRS.FindFirst ("EXN = " & !EXN)
      If SortedRS.NoMatch Then
        MsgBox "EXN " & !EXN & " in ExhibitsData Table has no Student in ExhibitStudents Table!"
      Else   ' found the student
        If IsNull(SortedRS!NCAT) Then
           MsgBox "EXN " & !EXN & " Does not have NCAT assigned!"
        End If
      End If
      '  end rev 5.3.5 change
     .FindNext "EXN BETWEEN " & FirstHoldEXN - 1 & " AND " & NextHoldEXN + 1
    Loop
    ' Reset NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT in table FAIR info for the current fairyear
    ' Private FairInfoRS As Recordset
    With FairInfoRS
      .FindFirst "FAIR_YEAR = " & FairYear()
      If Not .NoMatch Then
        .Edit
        !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT = NextAddExn ' So any new will just keep adding/notoverwrite
        .Update
      End If
    End With
    .MoveFirst  ' go to first record in the ExhibitData table recordset
    If NoNCATEXN = True Then
      MsgBox NewExFound & " New Exhibits" & vbCrLf & _
         "Total Renumbered: " & NewExReNumbered & vbCrLf & _
         tempcount & " Exhibits NOT RENUMBERED! " & vbCrLf & _
         " ('NCAT' not set, too many for a category, No ExhibitStudent table entry, Etc.)" & vbCrLf & _
           "These were renumbered starting at " & FirstAddExn & " (Add Range)"
      .FindFirst "EXN > " & FirstAddExn - 1 ' go to the first one for user to see
      Me.tbTask.SetFocus
      Me.tbTask.Text = "Exhibits with no/bad NCAT (EXN >= " & FirstAddExn & ")"
    Else
      'MsgBox NewExFound & " New Exhibits" & vbCrLf & _
      '   "Total Renumbered: " & NewExReNumbered
      Me.tbTask.SetFocus
      Me.tbTask.Text = NewExFound & " New, Total Renumbered: " & NewExReNumbered & _
              " - No Errors!"
    End If
    Call ScifairLog("Sort and Renum New: ", NewExFound, _
                                      NewExReNumbered & " Total Renumbered")
  End With
  SortedRS.Close
  Exit Sub
ErrorSub:
  MsgBox Err.Description
  Exit Sub
move2mbackerror:
  MsgBox "Some problem has resulted in leaving some Exhibit Numbers" & vbCrLf & _
         "in the range " & NextHoldEXN & " and higher!" & vbCrLf & _
         "You will have to manually change each of these Exhibit's" & vbCrLf & _
         "EXN to any 'unused' number between 100 and " & NextHoldEXN - 1 & vbCrLf & _
         "Then try Exhibits Sort and Renumber again! " & vbCrLf & _
         " (If the problem persists, call your programming consultant!)"
  Me.tbTask.SetFocus
  Me.tbTask.Text = "Error Setting Temporary EXN Numbers - You must Exit!"
         
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Load()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set dbSciFair = CurrentDb()
 criteria = "SELECT * from Categories ORDER by NCAT;"
 Set CategoryRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
 Title = "ReNumber Exhibits"
 criteria = "SELECT * from FairInfo WHERE FAIR_YEAR = " & FairYear()
 Set FairInfoRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
 FirstHoldEXN = FairInfoRS!FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT + 100000  ' 100001 + 100000 = 200001
        ' 200000 temporary place to renumber Exhibits to while hold
        ' If new exhibits, they will be 100,000 to 10n,nnn and
        ' NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT will be 10n,nnn + 1
 FirstAddExn = FairInfoRS!FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT '100001 Where added EXNs go that
        '  have no NCAT set This requires that all those new exhibits be
        '  moved to FirstHoldEXN range before use FirstAddExn
 Dim temprs As Recordset
 Set temprs = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset("ExhibitJudges", dbOpenDynaset)
 If Not temprs.EOF Then
   MsgBox "Judges have been assigned! (ExhibitJudges has records)" & vbCrLf & _
          "IF YOU HAVE PRE-PRINTED Score Forms, DO NOT RENUMBER!" & vbCrLf & _
          "If you renumber, you will have to RE-ASSIGN Judges" & vbCrLf & _
          " and RE-PRINT FORMS (if applicable) ", , Title
 End If
 temprs.Close
 Set temprs = Me.Recordset.Clone
 Dim FloorNotN As Boolean
 FloorNotN = False
 With temprs
   .MoveFirst
   Do While Not .EOF
      If IsNull(!FLOOR) Or !FLOOR <> "Y" Then  ' check every one that is not a floor
         If IsNull(!FLOOR) Or !FLOOR <> "N" Then  ' trigger message and change to "N"
           FloorNotN = True   ' found a table (not floor) not set to N (ie blank) or '?'
           If IsNull(!FLOOR) Or !FLOOR <> "?" Then
             .Edit
             !FLOOR = "N"
             .Update
           End If
         End If
      End If
     .MoveNext
   Loop
 End With
 temprs.Close
 If FloorNotN = True Then
    MsgBox "FLOOR had entries not 'Y' or 'N'." & vbCrLf & _
            "'?' entries Left Same, Blanks set to 'N'!", , Title
 End If
 Me.tbTask.SetFocus
 Me.tbTask.Text = "Ready to Renumber!"
 MsgBox "IMPORTANT!" & vbCrLf & _
        "You must STOP all Exhibit Data Entry" & vbCrLf & _
        "At ALL WORKSTATIONS before Renumbering!"
 Exit Sub
SubError:
 MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Unload(Cancel As Integer)
 CategoryRS.Close
End Sub
Private Sub Command9_Click()
' exit button
On Error GoTo Err_Command9_Click
    DoCmd.Close
Exit_Command9_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_Command9_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_Command9_Click
End Sub
